author: USA TODAY, Maria Puente, USA TODAY
title: Prince Charles' coronavirus diagnosis is a huge deal for Brits, the monarchy. Here's why.
description: The coronavirus threat was alarmingly vivid Wednesday in the United Kingdom with the news that Prince Charles has contracted the virus.
content:
Prince Charles has tested positive for the coronavirus after displaying "mild symptoms," according to a statement.
USA TODAY
